title: E field - 3 pt charges at x equals -3 -1 and 1 m

content.question: Three point charges are located along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis of a coordinate system, as shown in the figure. What is the magnitude of the electric field on the axis at <math alttext="x equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="3 newtons per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N/C</mtext></math>
<math alttext="9 newtons per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>9</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N/C</mtext></math>
<math alttext="21 newtons per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>21</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N/C</mtext></math>
<math alttext="27 newtons per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>27</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N/C</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="21 newtons per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>21</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>N/C</mtext></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
